definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute positioned ~ ~ ~ run summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["LOTW-ally"],CustomName:'{"text":"LOTW-trackerstart"}',NoGravity:1b,Marker:1b,Invisible:1b}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute positioned ~ ~ ~ run particle minecraft:firework ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.15 10 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute positioned ~ ~ ~ run tag @e[type=!armor_stand,tag=!LOTW-user,distance=..5] add LOTW-spelltracker</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute positioned ~ ~ ~ run effect give @e[type=!armor_stand,distance=..5] glowing 1 1 true</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/kill @e[name=LOTW-trackerstart]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
